paragraph: Maria de Alvear (born 1960 in Madrid, Spain) is a Spanish-German composer living in Germany who was born to a Spanish father and German mother. She studied with Mauricio Kagel at the Hochschule für Musik und Tanz Köln, completing a course in new music theatre in 1986.
New York Times review by Bernard Holland of Maria de Alvear's World (May 17, 1997), accessed 8 February 2010
